bill_title: make an appropriation for the regents scholarship program.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to make an appropriation for the regents scholarship program. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. There is hereby appropriated from the people's trust fund and people's interest fund the sum of one million seven hundred sixty-four thousand dollars ($1,764,000), or so much thereof as may be necessary, to the Board of Regents to provide funding for the regents scholarship program. Section 2. The executive director of the Board of Regents shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay expenditures authorized by this Act. Section 3. Any amounts appropriated in this Act not lawfully expended or obligated by June 30, 2002, shall revert in accordance with § 4-8-21. 450 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to make an appropriation for the regents scholarship program. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. There is hereby transferred from the tobacco settlement interest fund to the general fund to be commingled with amounts on deposit therein the sum of one million seven hundred sixty-four thousand dollars ($1,764,000), and an equal amount or so much thereof as may be necessary, is hereby appropriated from the general fund to the Board of Regents to provide funding for the regents scholarship program. Section 2. The executive director of the Board of Regents shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay expenditures authorized by this Act. Section 3. Any amounts appropriated in this Act not lawfully expended or obligated by June 30, 2002, shall revert in accordance with § 4-8-21. 450 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
